subtitle: This stylish hot salad makes a good lunch, light supper or a starter when entertaining.

method.text: Place the pasta in a large pan of boiling water and cook for 8-10 min until al dente. Drain thoroughly.
Meanwhile, heat half the oil in a large saucepan. Add the onion, garlic and pepper and fry for 3 min or until softened. Remove from pan and keep warm.
Add the beef and remaining oil to the pan and stir-fry for 4-5 min or until browned. Stir in the mustard and soy sauce and cook for 2 min.
Meanwhile, plunge the green beans in a saucepan of boiling water and cook for 2 min. Drain and refresh under cold running water.
Return the onion and pepper mixture to the pan. Stir in the beans and drained pasta.
Heat through for 3-5 min. Serve in warmed bowls.

title: Mustard-dressed beef and pasta salad
